lines: I’ve seen many winters, young one.
More than I would have liked, to speak frankly.
But one must remain steadfast and endure all the misery and suffering.
Take the blows as they come, as my old man always used to say.
Wouldn’t mind traveling with you for a while.
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
Then I shall keep working for safety in this lands still.
And never stop fighting until the end is here.
